text: Gitanjali is a book of poems written by Rabindranath Tagore. There are 157 poems in the book. All the poems are in the Bengali language. It has been translated into many languages by many writers. Gitanjali is a book of song offerings. Rabindranath Tagore won the Nobel Prize for Literature on November 14, 1913, for his book Gitanjali'. 'It also contains the special poem known as the"mind is without fear". Category:Poetry books Category:1910 books Category:Indian literature
title: Gitanjali
